entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries and freezing drizzle ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:52 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 8:52 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm except locally 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:52 AM NDT Thursday 13 April 2023
